introduction.summary: With over a decade of experience in tech, I specialize in Application Development and DevOps, with a dash of security and growing interest in AI. Known for my ability to enhance team productivity and project outcomes, I lead by example, fostering a culture of trust, honesty, and mutual respect. My technical expertise is complemented by a strong commitment to automating solutions and optimizing processes. I actively engage in mentoring and supporting my peers, promoting a team environment that is greater than the sum of its parts.

experiences.title: Applications Cyber Security Engineer (Contractor, through Dogwood Management Partners LLC)
experiences.description: Led shift-left security solutions, focusing on automation and vulnerability management.
highlights: Integrated Software Bill of Materials automation for Python projects with OWASP-CycloneDX.
Authored risk assessment documentation for out of date software.
Migrated documentation to a Docs as Code solution on Azure DevOps.
Scripted cloud solution for converting vulnerability scan results into ADO tickets.
Added OWASP Dependency-Check automation to Maven pipelines.
Initiated and conducted regular mental wellness check-ins to support team members during remote work transitions.

Supported web and desktop display libraries with MEDITECH proprietary languages.
Designed and maintained MEDITECH's first cloud Jenkins CI solution on GCP.
Authored dozens of features and bug-fixes for Jira-SVN integration and automation.

Provided developer-education through mentoring, presentations, classes, office hours, and documentation.
Served as scrum master and created roadmaps for software delivery-related epics.
